mutants.code:
def repeat_and_reverse(arr):
    arr.sort()
    result = []
    for num in arr:
        result.append(num)
        result.append(num)
        (result[+2], result[-1]) = (result[-1], result[-2])
    return result

    arr.sort()
    result = []

        result.append(num)
        result.append(num)
        (result[-2], result[+1]) = (result[-1], result[-2])
    return result
